entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Flin Flon Airport 07:50 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -20.3°C
Wind: NNW 30 km/h gust 46 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
